chairs that are more comfortable about me  i am           pounds  overweight   in my early    s  i maintain good posture  practice yoga  but have had some minor neck problems due to hyper mobility  i love hammocks  my living space       sq ft   i bought this for   reasons     using it in zero gravity mode for relaxing and meditating     napping      watching tv and reading at a slight incline  and    lounging outside when it is warmer  easy to fold when not in use  etc  i really really wanted the timber line xl padded zero gravity chair  but i am on a budget review of the chair  it arrived undamaged  note  if you want it in an amazon box to surprise someone  select that option at checkout  opened the box  the chair comes assembled  it folds nicely  and it was easy to carry upstairs  there are no directions  no paperwork  it isn t difficult to figure out  it opened smoothly  on each side there is a little dial to unscrew to recline to desired level  then screw the other way to lock in position  all good so far then i sat in it  my head rests against the very uncomfortable metal bar  there is a small headrest lumbar pillow  in the lumbar area the mesh hangs down and does not  hug  your back like a hammock  i tried moving up and down  there was no comfortable position  i wanted to ease back into the nasa zero gravity position  no luck  i got back far enough  about     degrees  no change in the lumbar area  i put a mackenzie roll behind me to fill the gap to no avail  my head  using the  headrest   sank into the upper metal bar  i immediately got a headache  so i got out  even my lower back was bothering me  in    minutes i went from feeling fine to a terrible headache in my opinion  my chair must be defective  given so many other reviews where people are tumbling backwards  not reclining  having the chair collapse  etc  i am happy for the people who got a quality controlled recliner for the rest of us  this is a very evil chair that causes pain  i recommend staying away from it

once you re in the chair feels great no matter what position you have it in  however  getting into the chair can be a bit of a challenge  especially for those of us who are older  the foot rest  as you can see from the picture  extends past the  feet  of the chair and does not sit flush with the ground  standing in front of the chair and sitting down in a normal fashion is actually quite a drop  straddling the foot rest is uncomfortable  but provides a shorter drop into the chair  i don t want to give mine up  but i wouldn t recommend it to anyone else who is past the nimble stage of their life

this chair is amazing  it s the most comfortable reclining  lawn chairs i ve ever sat laid on  it s portable  and easy to fold unfold  the lock feature gives you the confidence and security that you want and need in a reclining chair  the headrest gives you the added cushion and comfort that you want in a reclining chair  the price is right for this chair  overall i highly suggest purchasing this chair

loving this chair  so comfortable and moves positions so smoothly  the pillow is super comfy and can slide up or down to be used as a lumbar support as well  breathable material makes it tolerable in hot temps  the only thing missing is a cup holder but i can live  highly recommend
